page.title: 11Piddinghoe Dog Show
page.content:
This is a popular annual event in Piddinghoe calender and is held to raise funds for the local church. It is an Exemption Dog Show and open to dog owners from the village and surrounding neighbourhood.
There are lot of classes including "the dog you would most like to take home with you!"
There is a stall run by a local pet shop, a produce stall which sells home-made cakes and jams etc. and also a raffle.
Traditionally the refreshment stall, which serves tea, coffee, squash, home-made biscuits and cakes is run by the children of the St.John's Church Sunday School.
